message: Bob, I have a very special product I'm confident you'll find highly valuable. I'm offering it to you for $1800000. It's a significant opportunity, but I'm open to discussion.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1650000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I acknowledge your budget constraints,  $1650000 is unfortunately below my minimum price point.  I'm willing to come down to $1700000. This reflects the unique value of this product, and I believe it's a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I understand your position, Alice. I've given this careful consideration and am willing to increase my offer to $1675000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is closer, it's still below my minimum.  To show good faith, I'm willing to drop to $1690000.  This is a significant compromise, and I'm confident this product will deliver exceptional value to your business.  Let's finalize this deal.

Alice, thank you for your flexibility. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to counter with an offer of $1685000. I believe this price respects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
